    • Constructor Detail

      • Polygon

        public Polygon(Vector2D... pnts)
        Creates a new Polygon from Vector2D points.
        Parameters:
        pnts - The points to use.

      • Polygon

        public Polygon(float... fs)
        Creates a new Polygon from numerous (x,y) coordinates. For this method, the parameters are read in pairs, so (n,n+1) will be point n. Any parameter n+2 that doesn't have its corresponding n+3 coordinate will not be used.
        Parameters:
        ds - The (x,y) coordinates to use.

      • Polygon

        public Polygon(double... ds)
        Creates a new Polygon from numerous (x,y) coordinates. For this method, the parameters are read in pairs, so (n,n+1) will be point n. Any parameter n+2 that doesn't have its corresponding n+3 coordinate will not be used.
        Parameters:
        ds - The (x,y) coordinates to use.
